item.title: Golang WebApp Upstart Service
item.description: I am running a small webapp and wanted a small service to restart the webapp on boot. There are lot of scripts and tutorials out there, but the solution turned out to be pretty simple. the webapp binary is upn. # upnworld - upn job file description "upnworld.com server" author "Darshan Sonde<darshan.sonde@gmail.com>" start on starting mysql stop on shutdown chdir /home/darshansonde/go/bin exec /home/darshansonde/go/bin/upn 2>&1 >/var/log/upn.log to start service
